nodes.text: Terra tree toads were a species of toad native to the planet Batuu. They lived in the Batuu tree. Their calls could be heard from within Black Spire Outpost. Some residents of Batuu raised terra tree toads as pets or for other reasons.

Terra tree toads were created for Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park on May 31, 2019. While not physically present in the park, sound clips of the toads' calls can be heard in certain areas.
